h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Captain Wise-Voice
content: Keep strafing, and wait for lasers to start hitting the ground near you to trigger incoming lightning strikes on your position. This is a great time to use Cloud Step to give it the slip, allowing you to conserve stamina for the final act.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Captain Wise-Voice'.
The content is as follows:
Keep strafing, and wait for lasers to start hitting the ground near you to trigger incoming lightning strikes on your position. This is a great time to use Cloud Step to give it the slip, allowing you to conserve stamina for the final act.
